regen.absent_element: necessary information in the functional identity besides the train number
regen.new_specification: The functional identity shall also include the train type and service details for better identification.
The system shall verify and confirm the engagement of the loudspeaker upon call connection, ensuring proper audio output.

regen.absent_element: other components of the functional identity to the controller
regen.new_specification: The system shall disclose all available components of the functional identity to the controller, including any additional identifiers necessary for the call.

label: The functional identity includes the engine number, if no train number is available.
absence: situation of no train number is available
